Title: Nora Inu
Writer: Richard Morgan (based on the novel by), Laeta Kalogridis (created by), Nevin Densham, Casey Fisher, Nevin Densham (executive story editor), Richard Morgan (novel)
Actors: Joel Kinnaman, James Purefoy, Martha Higareda, Chris Conner
Plot: As Kovacs reconnects with a figure from his past, his tangled history with the Protectorate, the Uprising and Quell plays out in flashbacks.
